name: major_league_soccer_standings
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool major_league_soccer_standings.
Tool description: Major League Soccer (MLS) Standings & Table
API description: Fetches the Major League Soccer standings for a given season using the RapidAPI service.

season.description: The season year for which to retrieve standings. Defaults to None, in which case the latest season's standings are fetched.
